originalText.text: Luba is not just a music teacher. She is a highly creative and compassionate catalyst for positive life changes in children. She empowers them to develop self-care skills, nurture their self-esteem, and realize their full potential as human beings. I am truly grateful for the way she unlocks doors of opportunity and generously shares her patience and love for music. Really recommend for all.

originalText.text:
Ms. Guseva is an amazing teacher who introduced my son to the world of piano and vocal. Ms. Guseva is not only talented and professional instructor and musician, she is also a very patient, attentive and kind person. Ms. Guseva strives to create a special personal connection with each of her students which helps everyone of them to grow and enjoy the process in comfortable environment.  Along with weekly music lessons my son has an opportunity to participate in music concerts and practice his musical skills in public. Each year the school has at least two concerts, but everyone gets an opportunity to perform on few more events. Ms. Guseva encourages my son for growth and enriches his learning process through different techniques. Her love to music and great personality makes kids enjoying every lesson.
I recommend Guseva's Music School to anyone who wants to learn or get better at piano or vocal in a great environment.

originalText.text:
Luba is an amazing Piano teacher. She was able to connect with my 10 and 9 year old daughters right away. She has a calm, kind energy and possesses positive leadership skills. My daughters learned not only how to play notes, and music, read sheet music but also theory, technique and the love for classical music. Unfortunately they stopped playing for few years, and then came back to Luba again, and flourished even more! She tailors each session/lesson to suit teenage girls interests and encourages them to push their abilities.
Luba is very professional and punctual as well. We highly recommend her! We are blessed that we found a teacher as patient, friendly and knowledgable as Luba!

We’d recommend Luba to anyone who wants to learn piano regardless of age or skill level.

originalText.text: I’m impressed by Luba’s unique way of teaching piano. She has a great attitude, very patient and professional. She is an awesome person! I highly recommend her as a piano teacher!

originalText.text:
Luba is a teacher of my 6 years old son. He really likes his lessons and comes to them with pleasure because Luba makes every lesson really interesting and joyful.
I’m always sitting nearby and can see how nicely and professionally Luba works. She is an awesome teacher, very professional, with warm and kind personality; I highly recommend her for everyone who wants to learn piano.
